import React from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { MapPin, Link, Star, TrendingUp, FileText, Shield, Target, Zap } from 'lucide-react'; const Services = () => { const services = [ { icon: MapPin, title: 'Google Business Profile Optimization', description: 'Complete setup and optimization of your Google Business Profile for maximum local visibility and search ranking.', benefits: [ 'Professional profile completion and optimization', 'Category and keyword optimization', 'Photo and media optimization', 'Hours, services, and attributes setup', 'Review management and response strategies' ], results: 'Most clients see 40-60% improvement in local search visibility' }, { icon: Link, title: 'Strategic Map Embed Stacking', description: 'Advanced placement of Google Maps embeds across high-authority websites to build local search signals and authority.', benefits: [ 'White-hat embedding on high DA websites', 'Tiered approach for natural link building', 'IP-diverse strategy for safety', 'Authority building across multiple domains', 'Geographic targeting for local relevance' ], results: 'Typically generates 200-400% increase in local ranking signals' }, { icon: Star, title: 'Review Generation & Management', description: 'Proven systems to generate authentic, positive reviews while managing your online reputation effectively.', benefits: [ 'Automated review request systems', 'Review monitoring and alerts', 'Professional response management', 'Review optimization for SEO', 'Reputation crisis management' ], results: 'Average 3-5 new reviews per month with 4.5+ star ratings' }, { icon: TrendingUp, title: 'Local Citation Building', description: 'Comprehensive local citation building and high-quality backlink acquisition to strengthen your domain authority.', benefits: [ 'NAP consistency across all platforms', 'Industry-specific citation building', 'High DA backlink acquisition', 'Local business directory submissions', 'Citation cleanup and monitoring' ], results: 'Builds 50-100 quality citations per month' }, { icon: FileText, title: 'Monthly Performance Reporting', description: 'Comprehensive monthly reports showing your progress, local ranking improvements, and actionable insights.', benefits: [ 'Detailed ranking tracking and analysis', 'Call volume and lead generation metrics', 'Competitor monitoring and analysis', 'Performance insights and recommendations', 'ROI tracking and reporting' ], results: 'Clear visibility into your local SEO performance and ROI' } ]; return (
